message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale today, priced at $1000000. While I can't reveal the specifics yet, I can assure you it's a high-quality item with tremendous potential value. I'm also considering the fact that you're starting from a clean slate, so there's no prior reputation to influence my decision.
